alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Hooker (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 4:50PM CDT until June 05 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Hooker County in west central Nebraska... * Until 530 PM CDT/430 PM MDT/. * At 450 PM CDT/350 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles northwest of Mullen, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mullen, Giant Hill, Marsh Flat, Highway 97 crossing Big Creek, Sevenmile Hill and Kelso. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 180 and 191. Highway 97 between mile markers 62 and 88. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
